attributes.action: Introduce tougher laws for unethical dog breeders and owners of dangerous dogs
attributes.additional_details:
In light of recent tragic events surrounding the xl bully - simply banning the breed isn't good enough 

The breeding of dogs needs to face stricter regulations and those with out of control dogs need to face harsher sentences 

Without any firmer legislation this will continue to happen and there WILL be another modified breed in years to come

The XL Bully along with the pit bull before hand is such a brilliant family dog with the correct breeding/ownership
attributes.background:
Introduce stricter legislation and ensure breeders are fully licensed and registered with a governing body. Bring in tougher sentences for those 'backyard breeders' who aren't registered and licensed 

Ensure tougher sentences and penalties for those with dogs not under control

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Require anyone who breeds dogs to have a licence:

Bad owners are to blame not the breed - don't ban the XL bully:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643611

Remove breed specific legislation. Consider alternative methods for dog control:
